#pragma once
#include <string>

namespace spide2d {

struct key {
    [[nodiscard]] std::string human_readable() const;

    [[nodiscard]] static key create_from_human_readable(std::string_view key_name);

private:
    key() = default;
};

}  // namespace spide2d
